title: The.Brief.S02.COMPLETE.DVDRip.XviD-TAR
description:
Synopsis:

From the creators of Inspector Morse and Kavanagh QC comes an engaging blend of courtroom drama, suspense, intrigue, humour and humanity. Alan Davies (Jonathan Creek, Bob & Rose) stars as criminal lawyer Henry Farmer, a crusading barrister who is honorably engaged in the fight for truth and justice in the courtroom. Possessing a tremendous gift for cross-examination and a silver tongue in vital closing speeches, Henry is a formidable opponent and greatly admired by his colleagues however his personal life is chaotic with a huge workload, massive debts and unrequited love.
